summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Center Department; authorizing the execution of an amendment to the Agreement between The City of Seattle and Ackerly Communications, Inc. and SSI Sports, Inc. to grant to the Licensee certain advertising privileges in exchange for the Licensee's removal of the existing scoreboard and its purchase, installation, maintenance and operation of a new scoreboard and certain associated signing in the Seattle Center Coliseum and the payment of certain additional fees to the City.
